attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For over a year we have had the same old message that the website is coming soon, well now we are sick and tired! We want a website that is updated regularly, so we can follow our favourite artist!

The designers have managed to create numerous new websites and COMPLETE them since Kate's was launched.

It's about time we got it now...

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
